ygData.subject: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson nods.  She was, but she was sent out of the room, due to some emotional instability on my part.  Leo Prime thought it was best not to endanger anyone

Tucson nods.

" She was, but she was sent out of the room, due to some emot=
ional instability on my part.  Leo Prime thought it was best not to endange=
r anyone and he was correct in his judgement.  I will not lie, I have a wea=
kness and it's my temper compounded by the temperament of my beast form.  I=
 sense there were issues on the old dragon's part that never were resolved.=
  And now those issues are mine.  But I will do my best to control my tempe=
r.  Now as far as assistance goes, yes I would be honored if you would help=
 in the search for our missing comrades.  Which ever task you want, feel fr=
ee to take it on.  And I welcome everyone's input on this too. "

Perpetual=
ly on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 24, 2011, at 7:35 PM, Airshado=

ay with Nightlight and elita, in order to avoid tjat Rodimus attempt to abd=
uct them and give them some confort"said Windlord

t and Wheelie, I think we can definitely dispatch a ground crew to begin in=
vestigating that area of the jungle. We may not find anything or we might j=
ust find something. At least we can start with the basics and go from there=
. I believe Nightshift was very interested in doing a recon mission in that=
 area. Speaking of which, he must be at his place by the river. He seemed u=
pset before he left. He usually goes there to clear his directory. He shoul=
d return shortly."

o at the same

> > > >
> > > > " Yes, that's right, there was =
definitely high concentrations of Unicronian
> > > > energy being used at t=
hat point of time. Every being casts their own
> > > > energy frequency whe=
ther it be low, medium or high, depending on that
> > > > Individuals stren=
gth profile. Now, if those signatures are the same coming
> > > > from thos=
e various locations, it would indicate that the same individual is
> > > > =
responsible for those abductions. Leo, can you bring that data up for me by=

> > > > chance?"
> > > >
> > > > The strategist part of Tucson comes back =
to life as he begins to piece
> > > > things together as he did on Cybertro=
n, years ago.
> > > >
> > > > " This definitely takes me back In time when =
I was going over this with the
> > > > senior officers vorns ago. I actuall=
y enjoyed this aspect of military duty,
> > > > it was a good challenge for=
 a rookie in training. And the strange aspect of
> > > > that was the fact =
I just simply had a knack for solving complex strategies."
> > > >
> > > > =
He then thinks of Optimus Primal, and how they could determine his last
> >=
 > > location.
> > > >
> > > > " Mathematics, it has everything to do with =
numbers. The geographic
> > > > coordinates, they lead to areas of latitude=
 and longitude. Now, to find
> > > > Primal, he must have informed someone =
as to where he was going. We chart
> > > > the distance between here and th=
e intended destination, and map out various
> > > > routes leading to that =
location. You will come up with several different
> > > > scenarios but, th=
ey will all point to one area of bilocation. We then
> > > > factor in his =
rate of speed he was traveling at, including the time he left
> > > > here,=
 and the time it takes to reach the final destination. Then, determine
> > =
> > the time of his last transmission and that will indicate how far he got=
 and
> > > > where he could possibly be now. I know it sounds complicated, =
but it worked
> > > > on Cybertron, so let's see if that will work here."
>=
 > > 
> > > <NEW>
> > > 
> > > "One thing I have found Tuscon is that often=
 times one cannot solve
> > > every mystery while sitting at the drawing bo=
ard."
> > > 
> > > Manipulating the console LEO attempted to locate the inf=
ormation. "The
> > > last record of Optimus Primal . . . and at that point =
he was Optimal
> > > Optimus, was at the Base of the Pacifist Maximals the =
Atlantis base."
> > > He paused and read further. "An interesting point tha=
t was registered
> > > at that point was that thee was an Optimal Optimus P=
rime as well as an
> > > Optimus Primal?" LEO looked confused, then nodded,=
 "There was a
> > > meeting trying to determine if one was a minion or not.=
"

king

ruely resolved on that

rs soon after that with

s and it's my temper compounded by the temperament of my beast form.  =

ol my temper.  Now as far as assistance goes, yes I would be honored i=
f you would help in the search for our missing comrades.  Which ever t=
ask you want, feel free to take it on.  And I welcome everyone's input=
